title: Intel Sustainability Impact Analysis
subtitle: Assessed 600K+ device records to measure lifecycle CO₂ and energy savings through repurposing initiatives; identified 6,700+ tons of CO₂ reduction and 25.7 kWh energy savings per device annually using SQL joins and aggregation.

title: GameJet Transactions Analysis
subtitle: Examined 22K+ user sessions and in-app purchases to classify player personas (Free, Minnow, Dolphin, Whale). Revealed that under 10% of users drive the majority of platform revenue, supporting pricing and engagement strategy.

title: FastKitchen Customer Analysis
subtitle: Processed 50K+ customer orders to identify key spenders and frequency trends. Determined that top-tier customers contributed 67% of total sales, enabling targeted loyalty campaigns and data-backed retention models.

title: NBA Performance Analysis
subtitle: Analyzed 23K NBA games (2004–2020) to evaluate efficiency metrics and the evolution of home-court advantage. Found a 58.9% average home-win rate with a declining bias and rising 3-point performance correlation.

title: Startup Investment Analysis
subtitle: Ranked 27K+ startups by funding totals to identify sector trends and anomalies. Highlighted $57B in Cleantech funding outliers and volatility patterns across industries, illustrating investor risk concentration.

title: London Transit Analysis
subtitle: Modeled commuter flow across London Underground zones using SQL time-series analysis. Identified peak congestion and underutilized segments, providing actionable insights for route optimization and scheduling.

title: YouTube Trending Analysis
subtitle: Queried 6,351 trending videos to determine engagement drivers and category performance. Found correlation between engagement ratios (likes/comments/views) and daily ranking persistence to forecast viral content trends.

title: Traffic Collisions in California
subtitle: Processed 940K+ accident records integrating vehicle, driver, and condition datasets. Detected that weather, visibility, and impaired driving are leading risk factors, informing prevention strategies for safety programs.

title: Construction Job Demand Forecast
subtitle: Correlated NOAA weather data with regional construction job requests using predictive SQL models. Identified patterns linking severe weather conditions with labor shortages, supporting operational workforce planning.
